Ray is 43 years old and married to Delia, with whom he has four children. He lives with them in his own home, and he strives to give them a better quality of life. Ray is described as hard-working, friendly and cheerful. He works selling parts for motorcycles and motorcycle taxis, and he does tire repairs, oil changes, lube jobs, engine overhauls and other services. Ray also buys and sells small second-hand vehicles, which he restores to optimal condition so that he can resell them at a good price.

Ray runs his business from his own air-conditioned shop attached to his home. He displays the parts that his customers need, such as pistons and rings, spark plugs, tires, mud flaps, telescopic forks, headlamps and brakes. Ray thinks that his business does very well because the number of motorcycles and motorcycle taxis in the city is constantly increasing and there is a high demand for his products. Ray says that he enjoys his business because he knows it is the result of his hard work and dedication.

Ray is requesting this loan for 1,500 PEN to buy motorcycle parts such as axels, tires, spark plugs and brakes, which are the parts his customers ask for most. He also wants to buy a second-hand motorcycle so he can put it up for sale. Rays says that he is happy knowing that he can count on financial support to move ahead with his business.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle parts such as axels, tires, spark plugs and brakes.

loans.name: Seratta

texts.en:
Seratta lives in Compound # 3. She is 47 years old, married, and has six children between 14 and 26 years old; only three of them are in school and live at home. Her husband is a businessman. 

For the past 3 years, she has been selling palm oil and rice. She started this business with sell pay (the Liberian way of doing business. When you don’t have money, sell the goods, return the principle, and have the profit).

Some problem she is facing is having less money. She is requesting a loan to purchase palm oil and rice for her business. She learned this way of trade from her mother. She likes it because it makes her serious and strong, and its the fast way of getting money. Her plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and rice for her business.

loans.name: Maria Celia

texts.es: María, de 62 años de edad habita en casa  propia junto a su hermana quien depende de sus cuidados. María se dedica  a la venta de pescado, la venta la realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes  zonas de su comunidad. Su principal  patrimonio es su humilde vivienda que con el tiempo ha venido mejorando para protegerse de las lluvias y el sol. Solicita a FUSAI este crédito para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera ya que el techo se encuentra deteriorado  y no logran cubrir sus pertenencias de las lluvias. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y hacer el cambio de techo lo antes posible.
texts.en: María, 62, lives in her own house with her sister who depends on her for her care.  María works selling fish from place to place throughout her community.  Her main asset is her humble abode that’s been improving over time to protect herself from the rain and the sun.  She’s asking FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, nails and lumber because the roof is deteriorated and unable to protect her belongings from the rain.  She hopes to be able to count on this financing in order to replace the roof as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Hajira

texts.en: Hajira is 40 years old and a vigorous mother of four children. She has been stitching clothes for five years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Hajira has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenue so she may generate more income. She expects a boost in her earnings and wishes to spend the part of profits on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase spools of threads in different colors along with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Kosar

texts.en: Kosar is a 37-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store for the last four years. She makes a good income to meet her household's expenses. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health care. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of PKR 35,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is hopeful to increase her income and wishes to expand her business in the near future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 41 year-old married woman and a mother of five children. She has been doing a business of dry fruits sales for the past 16 years. Her husband also works selling dry fruits, and in this way she is able to handle her family needs and requirements effectively. She is contentedly doing it for the sake of her family. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. Naseem has requested a loan of RS 20,000 to purchase more stock of peanuts, walnuts and almonds. It will help her to inflate her sales. She dreams of providing a good lifestyle to her family.

loans.use: to purchase stock of peanuts, walnuts and almonds.

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es:
Doña María Erlinda es una mujer luchadora, emprendedora y muy dedicada a su trabajo y su familia con 46 años de edad, casada y madre de 2 hijos los cuales están en la primaria en diferentes grados de educación. Ella tiene un grado de educación secundario completo la cual se graduó como maestra de educación primaria la cual ejerce en una escuela de la comunidad y mientras no está en la escuela apoya a su esposo en los trabajos de la tierra en lo que es limpieza, aplicación de abono, foliares, etc. Ella aprendió dichas actividades a muy temprana edad ya que fueron sus padres quienes le enseñaran a trabajar la tierra siendo ellos agricultores por toda una vida. Las diferentes actividades en sus cultivos son elaboradas por ellos 2 y juntos son apoyo mutuo en la agricultura como unión familiar los cuales están ubicados cerca de su casa. Su producto es comercializado y vendido en el mercado local en pequeña escala con los diferentes vendedores de la zona. 
Actualmente ella solicita ayuda para la compra de insumos que mejoraran sus cultivos de café ya que por medio de esto ella podrá asegurar sus cosechas y el producto para generar ingresos para su familia.
Sus planes y metas a futuro son de ampliar sus cultivos comprando más tierra en la que ella pueda trabajar y fortalecer el patrimonio para sus futuros hijos venideros. Su sueño es ver a sus hijos realizados y estudiados a nivel universitario ya que de esa forma ella podrá prepararlos académicamente y dando en ellos seguridad y confianza para desenvolverse en un futuro.
texts.en:
María Erlinda’s a hardworking, enterprising woman who is very dedicated to her work and to her family.  She’s 46-years-old, married and mother of two children who are in different grades in primary school.  She completed secondary school and graduated as a primary school teacher.  She teaches at a local primary school and when she’s not at school helps her husband with field chores like weeding, applying manure and leaf fertilizer, etc.  She learned said tasks at a very young age for her parents taught her to work the land since they’ve worked in agriculture their entire lives.  She and her husband do the various field chores together and support each other in agriculture as a family unit; their fields are near their house.  Her product is sold and traded in the local market in a small scale to various local sellers.

She’s currently asking for help to buy supplies that will improve her coffee crop and insure a good harvest to generate family income.  Her plans and future goals are to expand her acreage buying more land to work and to strengthen her future children's estate.  Her dream is to see her children fulfilled and graduated from university since this is the way to form them academically and give them the security and confidence to be able to flourish in the future.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Juan Francisco

texts.es: Juan tiene 54 años de edad y habita en casa de su propiedad desde hace 16 años, junto a su esposa y nieta de 10 años de edad. Juan se dedica a la agricultura y a la venta de cerdos,  de esta forma lleva el pan de cada día a su hogar. Es un hombre comprometido, trabajador y muy responsable, para él lo más importante es que su familia esté cómoda y  segura. Su casa es muy humilde que con mucho esfuerzo va mejorando gracias a las ayudas que recibe de instituciones financieras. En esta ocasión se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un pequeño préstamo que le permita invertir en la compra de puertas ya que tal como se muestra en la fotografía no ha logrado comprarlas y sus ingresos no le alcanzan para hacerlo  por su cuenta.  Además quiere  comprar lámina galvanizada para hacer una división dentro de su casa.  De esta forma quiere darle a su familia un hogar cálido y seguro.
texts.en:
Juan, 54, has lived  in his own house for 16 years with his wife and 10-year-old granddaughter.  He works in agriculture and selling pigs; this is how he supports his home.  He’s a committed, hardworking, very responsible man.  What’s most important to him is that his family is safe and comfortable.

His house is very humble and with much effort he’s been improving it with help he gets from financial institutions.  On this occasion, he approached FUSAI to request a small loan that will make it possible for him to buy doors for as shown in the photo he’s been unable to buy them so far and his income is insufficient to do so on his own.  He also wants to buy galvanized metal sheets to make an interior division and provide a warm, safe home for his family.

loans.use: to buy doors for his house.

loans.name: Rosa Melida

texts.es: Rosa, de 39 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su grupo familiar el cual está constituido por su esposo y sus dos hijos.  Se dedica a la venta de queso en las diferentes zonas de su comunidad.  Rosa es muy conocida en su comunidad gracias a los buenos productos  y precios  que ofrece.  Cuenta con una vivienda muy humilde pero muy orgullosa porque junto a su esposo han logrado tener un espacio donde vivir. Actualmente las láminas del techo de su casa se encuentran deterioradas  y necesitan urgentemente un cambio ya que el agua de las lluvias se filtra y sus hijos y pertenencias se ven expuestos  a la humedad. Por lo anterior ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para comprar: lámina galvanizada, clavos, y madera. Espera poder contar con la ayuda y dar solución lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Rosa, 39, lives in her own house with her immediate family consisting of her husband and two children.  She works selling cheese in various parts of her community.  Rosa’s very well-known in her community thanks to the good products and affordable prices she has.  

She has a very humble home but she’s proud because she and her husband together have succeeded in having a place to live.  The metal sheets that make up the roof are currently rotten and urgently need to be replaced because rain leaks in and her children and her belongings are exposed to the dampness.  She’s therefore made the decision to ask FUSAI for this loan to buy galvanized metal sheets, nails and lumber.  She hopes to get this help so she can provide a solution to this as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 37-year-old married woman. She is a very talented lady, and has been successfully running stitching work in her community for the past 10 years. 

Her husband lost his one arm in an accident. She accepted the fact that if her husband works alone for their family, they will not be able to meet their household expenses or the educational needs of their children. 

She has good communication skills and client list. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses. Shazia wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors to meet the increasing demands of her customers. 

She hopes to grow her business, and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more reels of threads with packs of buttons, zippers and laces in various colors.

loans.name: Modest

texts.en:
Modest is 60 years old and married with 11 children. He earns his income through the sale of crops and livestock, and a monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools.

On his land, Modest grows maize, beans, rice, cassava and millet. He also has cows, goats, chickens, and sheep. Modest has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years.

As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging solution, and weighing scale) to share with his community vital agricultural information, and advise farmers in his village on the best farming practices.

With the additional income he will earn as a CKW, Modest will be able to pay school fees for his children. His dream in life is to become a successful model farmer in his community.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Ararat

texts.en:
Ararat is from Yerevan, where he lives with his wife and son. Ararat has been involved in the retail business for many years. His son works at a local copper molybdenum (chemical element) production company and supports the family's living.
But the main income of the family comes from the retail business in which Ararat has been involved. He purchases scrap metals (particularly copper) and sells it to local companies or factories. Due to his hard work and good communication skills, Ararat has several contracts with companies that are purchasing copper from him. So he purchases copper from individuals and sells it to local companies, thus gathering income from the difference. Now Ararat needs financial support to be able to purchase new stock of copper and sell it to customers.

He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. So the loan is very important for Ararat to be able to continue his retail business, and he will be very grateful to all his lenders for the support.

loans.use: new stock of copper to sell to customers

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 46 years old and is married with six children. He earns his income from the sale of crops and monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, John grows maize, coffee, mangoes and bananas, and he raises chickens. John has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set and weighing scale) to share with his community agricultural information and help them to improve their crop yields. With the additional income he will earn as a CKW, John will be able to pay school fees for his children and build a better house for his family.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Tatevik

texts.en:
Tatevik is 35 years old. She lives in Vanadzor city, which is in Lori region. Tatevik is not married, and she lives with her retired parents. Since 2011, she has run her own clothes trading business. She has rented a stall where she sells clothes for women, teenagers, newborns and children. She brings all the clothes she sells from the wholesale markets of Yerevan city. Tatevik is the only breadwinner in her family, and with her business she manages to properly take care of her parents and pay for their everyday needs. She is a very successful business woman since she has many loyal customers and she gives very high quality service.

Tatevik asks for a loan of 900,000 Armenian drams to buy a lot of autumn-winter season clothes for her business.

loans.use: to buy autumn-winter clothes for her business

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza de 20 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 11 meses.  Maritza se dedica al negocio de tienda en la cual vende azúcar, aceite, golosinas, etc. Su compañero de vida es jornalero y  le ayuda en la economía del hogar. Maritza desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda ya que por el tiempo las lluvias y el sol se ha deteriorado. Es por esta razón que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar este préstamo y poder comprar lo necesario  como: lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera, etc. De esta forma espera darle un lugar más seguro a su pequeño hijo.
texts.en: Maritza is 20 years old and lives in her own home with her life companion and her 11 month old child. Maritza's business is a store where she sells sugar, oil, sweets, etc. Her life companion is a day laborer who also contributes to the household economy. Maritza wants to replace her roof of her house as over time it has deteriorated from the rain and sun. For this reason she has approached FUSAI to request this loan and be able to buy what she needs:  galvanized sheeting, nails, wood, etc. She hopes by doing this to give her young child a more secure place to live.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails, wood, etc.

loans.name: Candida

texts.es: Cándida, de 60 años de edad habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su familia desde hace 27 años. Ella es una mujer responsable, trabajadora pero sobre todo emprendedora.  Desde hace muchos años se dedica a la venta de queso, tamales y pan francés. Es muy activa dentro de su comunidad  y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su persona como una mujer respetable,  responsable y honrada. Ella posee  su casita pero necesita algunas mejoras ya que sus ingresos no le han permitido terminar algunos detalles. Solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar laminas y reparar el techo ya que con el tiempo se han deteriorado, además, necesita hacer un pasamano para asegurar el paso de las gradas ya que como se muestra en la fotografía es un área muy insegura y no hay nada para sostenerse.
texts.en:
Cándida, 60, has lived with her family in her own house for 27 years.  She’s a responsible, hardworking, enterprising woman.  She’s sold cheese, tamales and French bread for many years.  She’s very active in her community and many people give her good personal references as a respectable, responsible, honest woman.

She owns her house but it needs some improvements but her income hasn’t been sufficient for her to finish some details.  She’s asking FUSAI for this loan to buy metal sheets to repair the roof because it’s become deteriorated over time.  She also needs to build a banister on the staircase because, as shown in the photo, it’s a very unsafe area and there’s no way to hold on.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en: Shamim is a 48-year-old, married woman and a mother of three. She has been running a cloth business for the last five years. She purchases a variety of cloths from the main city and then sells them to the people of her vicinity. She has good communication skills and has become famous for selling good quality cloth in her community. Shamim requested a loan of PKR 35,000 from Kashf Foundation to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season by taking into account the choices and tastes of her customers. In this way, she would be able to earn more income through her greater sales. Shamim hopes to have a good experience with this new loan and wants to grow her business. She dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard efforts in her business.

loans.use: to buy a stock of different cloths for the winter season.

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 30-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. They make good amount of income to bear their household expenses. They have four children and want to provide them with good quality food, clothing and health. Naseem wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PK 30,000 to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demands of her customers. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Kishwer

texts.en: Kishwer is a 35-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store at the corner of her house. She offers a variety of grocery items and has become famous in the locality for providing good quality products.  Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts in years. She is a mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PK 35,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand of her customers. She is in her 2nd loan cycle with good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages

loans.name: Provia

texts.en: Provia is 32 years old and is married.  She has four children. She earns her income through the sale of livestock and monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land, Provia grows maize, beans, cassava and bananas. She also has cows, goats, chickens and pigs. Provia has served as a CKW for the last two years and she looks forward to renewing her CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW, she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to circulate vital agricultural information to members of her village so as to increase their crop yields and incomes. With the extra income she will earn as a CKW, Provia will buy more farm tools to boost her farming activities. She looks forward to becoming self-reliant and being seen as a model farmer in her community.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Prospero

texts.es: Prospero, de 71 años, es viudo y tiene cuatro hijos los cuales ya son independientes. Vive en su casa propia. EL trabajo de Prospero como actividad principal consiste en la siembra de plátano, papaya, piña, entre otros. También se dedica a la  reparación de motores electrógenos, motos, maquinarias y otros, el hace su trabajo de forma delivery va a donde le llamen y a la hora que lo soliciten, lleva haciendo este trabajo por más 20 años, es muy bueno en lo que hace y es por eso que siempre lo llaman para solucionar los problemas de las maquinas de sus clientes. Lo que le gusta de suS trabajoS es que puede generar ingresos para su hogar,  además de tener un horario que el mismo maneja. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva, por ello solicita de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado 4000 nuevos soles comprará semillas, abono orgánico para su sembríos.
texts.en:
Prospero is 71 years old, widowed, and lives in his own home. He has four grown children. Prospero works growing plantains, papaya, pineapples and other crops. He also repairs electric motors, motorcycles, appliances and other devices. Prospero has been working as an in-home repairman for more than 20 years, traveling to his customers whenever and wherever they call on him. Prospero is known for being very good at what he does, and he says that people always call him to fix their broken appliances. Prospero says that he likes his jobs because he makes money to cover his expenses and he sets his own schedule.

This is Prospero’s first Kiva loan. He says that it will allow him to carry out his plans, and he promises to make his payments on time. Prospero will use this loan for 4,000 PEN to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for his crops.

loans.use: to buy seeds and organic fertilizer for his crops

loans.name: Razia

texts.en: Razia is a 23-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a business of flower making for the last year. She offers various colorful flowers for decorating homes and events like birthdays, parties, etc. She sells them to the people of her community and also supplies in the local market.  She has good communication skills and has a good client list. She is motivated to provide for her family. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of PKR 20,000 to buy raw material such as fabric, tissue papers and glace papers along with packs of paints in various colors. In this way she will be able to meet with the increasing demands of her customers consistently. She is in her third loan cycle, with good credit history. She wishes to spend part of the revenues to deal with the expenses of her family and to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy raw material such as fabric, tissue papers and glace papers along with packs of paints in various colors.

loans.name: Suria

texts.en: Suria is a 53 year-old married woman and a mother of six children. For the past three years, she has been running a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread winner at that point in time. With the passage of time, her sales increased and also her income. Now she has two buffaloes and one cow. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. She helps her husband in all family matters as well as financial matters. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of 35,000 to purchase another buffalo. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  She is in her 3rd loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Yesi Yamileth

texts.es: Yesi tiene 24 años de edad  está casada y tiene  un hijo de  dos años.  Ella posee un pequeño salón de belleza en donde corta y plancha cabello. Su compañero de vida le ayuda con la economía del hogar y juntos  mantienen a su familia. Su vivienda es muy humilde pero propia y junto a su esposo la van mejorando poco a poco. Ha solicitado este crédito a FUSAI para construir el cuarto del baño sanitario ya que el que posee es de madera y no es muy seguro; desea hacerlo de ladrillo para que tenga más resistencia y protección. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de arena, ladrillo y cemento. Espera poder contar con esta ayuda y así mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yesi, 24, is married and has a two-year-old son.  She has a small beauty salon where she cuts and straightens hair.  Her life companion helps her with household expenses and they support their family together.  

Her house is very humble but it’s hers and she and her husband have been gradually making improvements to it.  She’s asked FUSAI for a loan to build a bathroom because the one she currently has is wood and not very safe.  She wants to build it out of brick so that it will be more resistant and safer.  She will use the loan to buy sand, bricks and cement.  She hopes to get this help in order to improve the conditions at home.

loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Sabas Damian

texts.es: Sabas, de 40 años de edad habita  en casa propia desde hace 40 años junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa y sus dos hijas de 7 y 2 años de edad y un hijo de 4 años.  Sabas cuenta con un pequeño empleo en una panadería de su comunidad  y junto a su esposa quien tiene un negocio de tortillas (preparación alimenticia de masa de maíz) llevan el sustento a su hogar para mantener a sus hijos.  Es un hombre muy trabajador y dedicado y quiere lo mejor para su familia. Su principal posesión es su vivienda  que poco a poco ha venido arreglando para darle mayor seguridad a su familia. En esta ocasión desea mejorar las paredes  de su casa así como el piso que es de tierra y quiere poner ladrillo  para que sus hijos tengan un lugar más higiénico para jugar. Esta es la razón por la que solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de: cemento, arena, ladrillo de piso, etc. Y hacer las mejoras respectivas.
texts.en:
Sabas, 40, has lived in his own house for 40 years alongside his immediate family consisting of his wife and two daughters who are 7 and 2 years old and a 4-year-old son.  Sabas relates that he has a small job at a local bakery and he also has a tortilla shop with his wife.  They bring sustenance home to support their children.  He’s a hardworking, dedicated man who wants the best for his family.  

His main asset is his house which he’s gradually been improving to provide increased security for his family.  On this occasion, he wants to improve the walls as well as the dirt floor; he wants to install bricks so that his children will have a more hygienic place to play.  This is why he’s asking FUSAI for this loan in order to buy cement, sand, paving stones, etc. and make the respective improvements.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 44 years old and is married.  He has eight children. He earns his income through the sale of farm produce, operating a small business and monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW).  Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, John grows beans, coffee, cassava and Irish potatoes. He also raises goats and chickens. John has served as a CKW for the last two years and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to share actionable agricultural information with members of his village and together improve their crop and animal yields. With the additional income he will earn as a CKW, John will expand his farming activities on his four acre land. He looks forward to becoming a sustainable and model farmer in his community.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar-charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Memoona

texts.en: Memoona is 37 years old and works from home as a tailor. She has been in this line of work for many years now and is proud to be contributing to her household income. When Memoona was not earning, her family went through a severe financial crisis that compelled her to use her stitching skills in a productive manner. Her husband was the sole breadwinner of the family so she felt it obligatory to change her family’s living standards and started working from home. She is a brave woman, and her hard work helped her establish a good clientele, but she was having difficulty in fulfilling large orders. Memoona has requested a loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread. She dreams of giving a good-quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase a new stitching machine with some spools of thread.

loans.name: Remani

texts.en:
Remani is a 55-year-old married woman who has run a business selling milk with her husband for the past 10 years. She has two buffaloes and sells their milk to many people of her locality. She looks after the buffaloes and performs the task of collecting milk from them while her husband sells it to different places on a daily basis.  She needs to earn much more to meet their everyday expenditures, including food, clothing and education. 

In order to make larger profits, Remani requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo to cater to more customers. She is in her sixth loan cycle with good repayment history. She hopes to increase the production of milk, which ultimately will help in generating more cash.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo

loans.name: Vanesio

texts.en:
Vanesio is 36 years old and married with five children. He earns income mainly through the sale of crops and livestock, and earns a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools.

On his land, Vanesio grows beans, bananas, maize and cassava. He also has a cow, goats and chicken. After serving as a CKW for the last two years, Vanesio looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set, and weighing scale) to serve his village with agricultural information that will see farmers improve crop yields. 

Vanesio will use the added income as a CKW to buy more land and establish demonstration gardens that will work as learning centers for his community. His dream is to see his community adopt improved farming methods, and feel that he has contributed to it's development.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Khalida

texts.en: Khalida is a married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband in the corner of her house. She has 10 years of experience in this field. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stock of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she requested a loan of 40,000 Pakistani rupees to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages to meet with the increasing demands of her customers. She is in her third loan cycle with a good repayment history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Hamidan

texts.en:
Hamidan is a 28-year-old married woman.  She has been running a business selling milk for the past four years. 

She has two cows giving milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter and cheese that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough for her to lead a decent life. 

She has three children; she is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.  She has improved her business to meet the day to day expenses of life.  

Currently she requested for a loan of PKR 20,000 to purchase one more cow. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: Angela

texts.es: Ángela, tiene  57 años de edad y habita  junto a su hijo.  Ella es divorciada y desde que su pareja faltó es quien ha sido el sostén de su hogar. Gracias a sus esfuerzos ha logrado sacar a su hijo adelante. Ángela se dedica a la elaboración de comales, ollas y recipientes de barro; estos productos los vende dentro de su comunidad. Es muy emprendedora y responsable y cada día busca la forma de dar mejores condiciones a su hijo. Cuenta con una  casita muy humilde pero propia y con muchos esfuerzos la ha ido mejorando. Necesita hacer cambio de techo y mejorar las condiciones del piso, es por esto que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar este crédito que le permita comprar lámina galvanizada, clavos, madera, arena y cemento para hacer las mejoras necesarias.
texts.en:
Ángela, 57, lives with her son.  She’s divorced and since her spouse left she’s been her home’s sole source of support.  Thanks to her efforts she’s been able to move her son ahead.  Ángela works making griddles, pots and clay vessels that she sells in her community.  She’s very enterprising and responsible and seeks ways to improve her son’s conditions every day.

Her house is very humble but it’s hers and with much effort she’s been improving it.  She needs to replace the roof and make improvements to the floor which is why she approached FUSAI to request this loan to buy galvanized steel sheets, nails, lumber, sand and cement to make the necessary improvements.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is 37 years old and married. She has four children 17, 15, 13 and 10 years old, whom she supports. 

Janet runs a cereal business which has lasted for two years now.  It is located at Marereni.  She earns a monthly income of KES 4,050.

She was introduced to KADET Ltd by a Kadet officer, and she is taking a third loan from Kadet of KES 20,000, which she intends to use to buy more stock:  maize, beans, cow peas, green grams, and rice. Her previous loan of KES 20,000 she paid back to KADET successfully. 

She will use the anticipated profit to expand her business by making it a wholesale cereal business. Her  hopes and dreams for her future business are  to open a cereal depot and also to make sure her children get a better education and have brighter future

loans.use: To purchase maize, beans, cow peas, green grams, and rice to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Toribio

texts.es: El señor Toribio, es una persona de 47  años de edad de estado civil casado, con nivel de instrucción hasta la primaria, cuenta con seis dependientes económicos a cargo los cuales son sus hijos, vive en su propio domicilio de tipo rustico construido con material local, su domicilio se halla ubicado en la comunidad de Tíraque, su actividad económica principal del señor Toribio  es la producción agrícola en tal sentido anualmente produce los siguientes productos agrícolas; papa 140 cargas, haba (verde) 25 cargas, avena (forraje) 20 calchas  los cuales son cultivados en sus propios terreno agrícolas, con la venta de estos productos agrícolas sustenta a su familia económicamente, por ello el señor Toribio  solicita capital de operación para la compra de insumos agrícola, de tal forma en el futuro podra mejorar su situación económica.
texts.en: Toribio is 47 years old, single, and has an elementary school education.  He has six dependent children and lives in his rustic home built of local materials and located in the Tiraque community.  He is a farmer and every year produces 140 bushels of potatoes, 25 bushels of green beans, 25 beds of oats (fodder) on his own farmland.  The sale of these products supports his family financially.  Toribio is asking for working capital to buy farming supplies so that he will be able to improve his financial situation in the future.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies.

loans.name: Mariana

texts.es: Mariana de 38 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su pequeño hijo de 9 años. Es madre soltera y gracias a su trabajo y esfuerzo ha logrado mantener su hogar. Ella es artesana, todos los días se dedica a la elaboración de comales y ollas de barro, estos productos los vende dentro de su comunidad y es así como logra sacar el sustento para su familia. Tiene 30 años de contar con su casita la cual con muchos esfuerzos va mejorando, en esta ocasión ha tomado la decisión de hacer el cambio de las puertas las cuales son de madera y con las lluvias y el sol se han dañado, por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI,  para mandar hacer puertas metálicas que le permitan mayor seguridad y durabilidad. Confía que con este crédito logrará pagar la elaboración de dichas puertas y dar a su familia  un mejor respaldo.
texts.en:
Mariana, 38, lives in her own house with her nine-year-old son.  She’s a single mother and thanks to her work and effort has been able to support her home.  She’s a craftswoman.  She makes clay griddles and pots every day that she sells in her community to earn her family’s support.  

She’s owned her house for 30 years and she’s been improving it with much effort over time.  On this occasion she’s decided to replace the wood doors that have been damaged by the sun and rain which is why she’s asking FUSAI for a loan to have metal doors made that will provide increased security and durability.  She trusts that with the loan she’ll be able to pay to have said doors made and to give her family better support.

loans.use: to buy metal doors.

loans.name: Maria Ana De Jesus

texts.es: María es una mujer de 44 años de edad, habita en casa propia desde hace 15 años junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su compañero de vida, 3 hijas y un hijo.  Ella se dedica  a la elaboración y venta de queso. Su compañero de vida es agricultor y  le colabora con la economía del hogar. María es muy reconocida en su comunidad por ser muy trabajadora, responsable y por el buen producto que ofrece. Su  humilde vivienda es el principal patrimonio con el que cuenta por lo que ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, clavos y madera con el fin de cambiar el techo de su casita ya que últimamente el agua se le filtra y no puede proteger a su familia, espera contar con esta ayuda para darle mayor seguridad a su grupo familiar.
texts.en: María is a 44 year old woman. She has lived in her own home for the past 15 years together with her nuclear family, which consists of her life companion, 3 daughters and one son. She makes and sells cheese, Her partner is a farmer who also contributes to the household economy. Maria is well-known in her community for being hard-working, responsible and for the good product she offers. Her modest house is her main asset and she has decided to request a loan from FUSAI so she can buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood. She wants to replace the roof of her house as lately water is filtering through it and she can't protect her family. She hopes to be able to count on this help so she can provide more security for her family.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, nails and wood.

loans.name: Jacqueline Areli

texts.es: Jacqueline de 23 años de edad habita en casa propia junto a su pequeña hija de cinco años de edad. Es una mujer emprendedora pero sobre todo responsable,   todos los días se levanta muy temprano para dedicarse a las tareas del hogar y retomar su negocio que consiste en la venta de mariscos como: pescado, camarones, etc. La venta  la realiza de forma ambulante en las principales zonas de su comunidad y es así como logra llevar los alimentos a su familia. Su principal patrimonio es su casita que con muchos esfuerzos va mejorando.  Solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para comprar láminas galvanizadas y clavos para cambiar el techo de su hogar ya que el tiempo y las lluvias las han dañado y es necesario hacer el cambio pronto para evitar la filtración del agua y brindar mayor seguridad a su pequeña hija.  Espera poder contar con esta ayuda.
texts.en:
23-year old Jacqueline lives in her own home with her 5-year old daughter. She is an enterprising and above all, responsible, woman. Every day she gets up very early to take care of household chores and then gets back to her business selling seafood: fish, prawns etc. She sells the seafood in the main streets of the town and in this way feeds her family.

Jacqueline’s most important possession is her house which she is making a lot of effort to improve. She is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy galvanized sheeting and nails to renew the roof since age and the rainy season have damaged it. It is necessary to do this work quickly to prevent water leaking into the house. It will also provide greater safety for Jacqueline’s young daughter. 

She hopes that you will help her.

loans.use: buy galvanized sheeting and nails for her roof

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is 30 years old and is married.  He has three children. He earns income from the sale of crops and livestock as well as a monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area, including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land John grows maize, cassava, coffee and bananas. He also has chickens, goats and pigs. John has served as a CKW for the last two years and now looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set and weighing scale) to share real time actionable information with farmers of his village about farming and livestock. With the additional money he will earn as a CKW, John will buy more pigs so that he can set up a learning center to teach other farmers about pig farming. His biggest dream is to see his piggery project become sustainable and develop a pig research center.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca lives in compound #3. She is 40 years old and married with six children between the ages of 15 and 25; only four are attending school. Her husband is a security guide.

For the past three years, she has been running a table in her community where she sells many dried bonnie fish. A challenge she faces is that she doesn't have enough dried bonnie fish on her table.

She learned this way of selling from her mother. She is requesting a loan to buy more dried bonnie fish for her business. She hopes to build a shop and educate her children.

loans.use: to buy more dried bonnie fish for her business.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en: Azra is a 42-year-old married woman and a mother of five children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business.  Currently she requested a loan of Rs.35,000 to purchase another buffalo. This will help her to increase her sales, which will ultimately help in generating more income.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo.

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en: Musrat, age 27, is a married woman. She has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason, she requested a loan of Rs 30,000 from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers and buttons. It will allow her to stitch up more dresses on time, which ultimately help in generating more income for her.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors, with packs of laces, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Joy

texts.en: Joy is 37 years old and is married.  She has six children. She earns income from the sale of crops and livestock and operates a small retail shop. Joy also earns a monthly wage as a Community Knowledge worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members, who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On her land Joy grows beans, bananas, maize and cassava. She also has chickens and goats. Joy has served as a CKW for the last two years and now looks forward to renewing her contract for the next three years. As a CKW she will use the materials in her business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging solution and weighing scale) to share agricultural information about best farming practices to fellow farmers in her village. With the additional income she will earn as a CKW, Joy will be able to pay school fees for her children and increase her business working capital to generate more income for her family. She looks forward to becoming a prominent farmer and agricultural producer in her district.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set, and weighing scale so that she may provide vital farming information to her community.

loans.name: Lludy Yamileht

texts.es: Lludy, de 20 años de edad habita en casa muy humilde junto con su madre y su pequeño hijo de 5 años. Lludy  es una joven muy trabajadora y visionaria que con muchos esfuerzos  lleva el sustento a su hogar.  Ella trabaja diariamente en una hacienda que se dedica a la producción de guayabas y es su principal fuente de ingresos.  El  objetivo de Lludy  es brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia,  es por esta razón que se acercó a FUSAI para solicitar un préstamo que le permita hacer las instalaciones cables eléctricos necesarios y la conexión de la energía eléctrica en su hogar ya que hasta la fecha no ha podido hacerlo por falta de ingresos y espera poder contar con este crédito para cumplir su objetivo.
texts.en:
Lludy is 20 years old. She lives in a very modest house together with her five year old son and her mother. Lludy is very hard-working and far-seeing young woman who through a lot of effort manages to support her household. She works every day on a farm the grows guavas. This is her principal source of income. 

Lludy's main objective is to provide her family with better living conditions and so she has come to FUSAI to request a loan. She wants to install  the necessary electrical wiring and connect her house to the grid. She has not been able to do this up to now as she doesn't have the financial resources. She hopes to be able to count on this loan to fulfill her objective.

loans.use: to install electric wiring and connect to the electrical grid.

loans.name: Amiran

texts.en: Amiran is a 53-year-old married man. He lives with his wife, two children, daughter-in-law and granddaughter in the Ozurgeti district. His daughter-in-law works as a salesperson at a local supermarket and earns 200 GEL per month. Amiran works on a minibus line and gets a monthly salary. He decided to start his own business and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of $2,100 to purchase a truck to start a trading business. He will trade fruits and vegetables and will have a stable income.

loans.use: to purchase a truck for his trading business

loans.name: Sogharan

texts.en: Sogharan is a 59-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband, who is also shown in the photo. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. Sogharan is the mother of three children and is motivated to provide her family with good-quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of 50,000 PKR to buy packs of salts, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages to meet the demands of her customers. She is in her seventh loan cycle with a good credit history. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy salt, biscuits, rice, flour and beverages.

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is 44 years old and married, the mother of eight children. 

She has been running a business of purchases and sales of animals on a seasonal basis for the past six years. She buys animals (baby goats & baby cows) at low prices, brings them up, and then her husband sells them out in the market at higher prices. Currently she has three small cows and two goats and plans to sell them on Eid (religious event of Muslims) or any event which will enhance the profit. 

Shamim has gradually improved her business with the support of the Kashf Foundation.  She has now requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to purchase two more baby goats and a heifer. 

She is in her fourth loan cycle with a good repayment history.  

She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good and quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to purchase two more baby goats and a heifer.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo, tiene 55 años de edad, está soltero, tiene dos hijos y reside en el municipio de San Pedro Sula. Hace 6 años que tiene un taller de carpintería donde elabora puerta, mesas, sillas, muebles de cocina de madera etc. El taller lo tiene en su casa y los muebles los hace por pedidos.El préstamo que ha solicitado es por 11,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de madera y materia prima como lijas, pegamento, barniz etc. para la elaboración de puertas, sillas, mesas, muebles de madera. Su meta es desarrollar más el negocio y mejorar el nivel de vida de la familia.
texts.en: Wilfredo, 55, is single and has two children; he lives in the municipality of San Pedro Sula.  He’s had a carpentry shop for six years where he manufactures wooden doors, tables, chairs, kitchen cabinets, etc.  His shop is located at home and he manufactures the furniture to order.  The loan he’s requesting is for 11,000 Lempiras that he’ll use to buy wood and raw materials like sand paper, glue, varnish, etc. to make doors, tables, chairs and wood furniture.  His goal is to develop the business and improve his family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies.

loans.name: Maria Catalina

texts.es: Doña Maria, tiene 61 años de edad, esta casada, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en el municipio de Gracias Lempiras junto a su hija menor. Siempre se ha dedicado a la agricultura cultivando granos básicos, lleva 10 años que se dedica al cultivo de café. El café lo vende en grano en el mercado local. ha solicitado varios prestamos para mantener su finca en buen estado. El prestamo que solicita es por 10,000 Lempiras y lo va invertir en la compra de fertilizantes que utilizara para abonar el cultivo de café y  poder seguir dándole mantenimiento a la finca de café. Su meta es mejorar su nivel de vida y la de su familia y poder ayudar a su hija a que termine sus estudios.
texts.en:
María, 61, is married and has four children; she lives in the municipality of Gracias, Lempira with her youngest daughter.  She’s always worked in agriculture growing basic grains and has been growing coffee for the last ten years.  She sells the coffee beans in the local market.  

She’s requested several loans to keep her farm in good condition.  The loan she’s asking for now is for 10,000 Lempiras and she’s going to use it to buy fertilizer to fertilize her coffee plants to continue providing maintenance for her coffee farm.  Her goal is to improve her and her family’s standard of living and to be able to help her daughter complete her schooling.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her coffee crop.

loans.name: Saturnina

texts.es: Saturnina, de 42 años , esta casado y tiene tres hijas de  03, 04, 06 de edad respectivamente . El trabajo al que se dedica Saturnina es la venta de comida rápida y lo complementa con la venta de bebidas heladas. Diariamente se levanta muy temprano y se dirige al mercado de la ciudad en busca de los ingredientes que necesita para preparar sus comidad. Trabaja 06 años en este negocio y lo hace sola. Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que puede hacerlo a lado de sus hijas, siente que su negocio es muy rentable ya que vende un mínimo de 05 pollos al día que le genera una buena ganancia económica, empezó a trabajar con muchas ganas y logró aprender todo lo necesario para que su negocio logre consolidarse, le gustaría mejorar la infraestructura de su establecimiento para atender con mayor comodidad a sus clientes. En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 3000, por tanto agradece el apoyo que le brindan para continuar tras sus objetivos, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado comprará ingredientes e insumos para poder continuar con su trabajo tales como pollo, papa, aceite, condimentos, verduras, arroz y otros.
texts.en:
42-year old Saturnina is married and has three daughters aged 3, 4, and 6. She earns her living selling fast food as well as cold drinks. She gets up very early every day and sets off for the town market searching for the ingredients she needs for the food. She’s had this business for six years and runs it by herself.

Saturnina really enjoys her work as she can do it while she looks after her children. She feels the business is profitable as she sells at least five chickens a day which brings in a good income. She started this job with great enthusiasm and learned all the was necessary to run a good business. 

Now Saturnina would like to improve the premises so that she can serve her customers in greater comfort. She is seeking a loan of S/. 3000 and wishes to thank donors for the support they bring so that she can complete her objectives. She promises to repay the money punctually. With the money she plans to buy ingredients and supplies so she can continue her work: chicken, potatoes, oil, condiments, vegetables, rice etc.

loans.use: buy ingredients such as chicken, potatoes, oil, condiments, vegetables, rice etc.

loans.name: Lida

texts.es:
Lida, de 41 años es una mujer honesta, responsable y muy trabajadora, está casada con Amador y junto a él tiene 03 hijos de 11, 08 y 02 años de edad con quienes vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Lida consiste en brindar servicio de mantenimiento a vehículos. Tiene su taller propio instalado en su casa en donde ofrece diversos servicios como parchado de llantas, reparación vehículos, bajada de motores, tejido de aro, entre otros. Trabaja con ayuda de su cónyuge y de otro ayudante. Su principal labor se centra en la administración del servicio. Lleva en este negocio 02 años atendiendo desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche. Ahora esta viendo la posibilidad de vender bebidas como gaseosas y cervezas debido a la demanda de sus clientes quienes le solicitan estos productos mientras esperan la culminación del servicio en sus vehículos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es el trato directo que tiene con sus clientes, le agrada ver su trabajo final y que ello contribuya a que sus clientes también trabajen mejor. Este es su cuarto crédito con Kiva, está muy emocionada y agradecida por el respaldo económico que le ofrecen para continuar con sus planes, no quiere dejar de pagarlo por falta de dinero y es por eso que se compromete a ser muy puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado de S/. 2000 comprará repuestos de motos y mototaxis y algunas herramientas que usa en su trabajo.
texts.en:
Lida, 41, is an honest, responsible, very hardworking woman married to Amador; they have three children together who are 11, 8 and 2 years old living with them in her own house.  Lida’s work consists in providing vehicle repair services.  She has her own shop located at home where she offers such services as tire repair, vehicle repair, engine block service, rewiring, etc.  She works with help from her spouse and another assistant.  Her main job is scheduling the repairs.  She’s been in business two years and is open from 7 in the morning to 10 at night.

She’s now looking into the possibility of selling beverages like soft-drinks and beer because of the high demand for said products from customers while waiting for their vehicle repairs to be done.  What she likes about her work is the direct interaction with her customers; she enjoys seeing the work done and knowing that she’s contributing to her customers being able to work better.

This is her 4th Kiva loan and she’s very excited and grateful for the economic backup she’s getting to continue towards her plans.  She does not want to fail to repay it for lack of money so she commits to be very punctual with her payments.

She will use the requested 2,000 soles to buy motorcycle and mototaxi spare parts as well as some tools used in her work.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and tools.

loans.name: Abbas

texts.en: Abbas is a 21-year–old who studies at Cooperation University. His studying years are 2010 to 2014, and his faculty is management. Abbas's father is an employee in the public sector, and his is the only source of income for the family. The father can't pay university installments for his son because of high family expenses. Abbas needs a loan 2,000 Azerbaijani manats. This loan will help him to pay the university installments for this semester so he can complete his studies. This will insure him a better life in the future.

loans.use: to pay his university installments for this semester

loans.name: Ismael Antonio

texts.es:
Condega un municipio conocido como tierra de alfareros por su artesanía y gente trabajadora, vive el señor Ismael  en una comunidad aledaña con su esposa y su hijo al que tiene el deber de mantener y darles sus estudios , de profesión, agricultor, en granos básicos maíz y frijoles y la ganadería en pequeña escala.

Ismael conocido como una persona honesta y trabajadora, tiene más de ocho años de experiencia y trabajar estos rubros, trabaja junto con su familia en su pequeña finca de cuatro manzanas que es alta mente productiva y quiere sacarle un buen provecho explotándola en uno de los mejores rubros de la zona como es el cultivo de frijol, hoy en día  nos está solicitando un crédito, para la compra de abono, insecticida, fungicida más gastos de mano de obra.
 
Su proyección es cultivar 2.5 manzanas de frijol y comercializarlos una vez que los coseche obteniendo un buen ingreso para cancelar y cubrir los gastos de su familia lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando en los nuevos ciclos agrícolas y mejorar el nivel de vida cada día de su familia ya que es su única forma de obtener ingresos.
texts.en:
Condega is a municipality known as the “Land of Potters” because of the crafts and its hardworking people.  Ismael lives in an adjacent community with his wife and son who he must support and provide schooling for.  His profession is agriculture; he grows basic grains like corn and beans and also raises livestock on a small scale.

Ismael is known as an honest, hardworking person.  He has more than 8 years’ experience in these lines of work.  He works with his family on a small, four-manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] farm that is highly productive.  He wants to take full advantage of it exploiting it in one of the best lines of work, bean growing.  He’s asking for a loan to buy manure, insecticide, fungicide and to pay labor costs.

He’s projecting 2.5 manzanas of bean production to sell once harvested earning enough income to repay the loan and cover his family’s expenses which will allow him to continue working new growing cycles and improve his family’s standard of living since this is his only source of income.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Darwin José

texts.es:
Darwin José vive  al sur de la capital trabaja en una universidad de Managua en el área de mantenimiento.
Darwin está solicitando a kiva un crédito  para invertirlo en la  compra de materiales de construcción como bloque, arena, cemento  ya que  tiene el proyecto de construir  un porche  para darle mayor seguridad a su casa. Ya que lo considera necesario  para la comodidad de su familia.
texts.en: Darwin José lives south of the capital and works in the maintenance department of a Managua university.  Darwin’s requesting a Kiva loan to buy building supplies like concrete blocks, sand and cement because he plans to build a porch to add more security at home.  He considers this necessary for his family’s comfort.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Noel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Noel Antonio vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja en el área de mantenimiento de un centro de compra de la capital desde hace 22 años.
  Noel esta  está solicitando un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de zinc y  madera  para hacerle el cambio  al techo a su vivienda que está en mal  estado y con el pago de su salario se le ha hace difícil ya que su ingresos mensuales los utiliza para  los gastos de alimentación y gastos escolares.
Ala vez nos manifiesta que está muy agradecido con ceprodel y kiva porque gracias a los financiamiento ha podido mejorar su casita para darle mayor comodidad a su familia .
texts.en: Noel Antonio lives in Managua. He has worked in the maintenance department of a shopping center in the city for the past 22 years. Noel is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of zinc sheeting and wood to replace the roof of his house, which is in bad condition. It is hard to pay for this with his salary as he uses that to cover food and school expenses. At the same time he tells us that he is very grateful to CEPRODEL and Kiva as thanks to this loan he can improve his house and provide more comfort for his family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like zinc sheeting and wood.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es:
El señor  Israel Antonio vive en la cuidad de Managua trabaja como vigilante en un centro de compra, es  padre de familia de dos pequeños  en edad escolar.
Israel nos manifiesta que  él es el único  sustento de su familia ya que su esposa se encarga de cuidar a sus hijos. Por esta razón se ve con la necesidad de solicitar un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de láminas de zinc y compra de manera para hacerle cambio al techo de su vivienda que al paso de los años se ha ido deteriorando y con el invierno se le ha hecho un problema porque se le pasa el agua al interior de su casa afectando a su familia.
A la vez aprovecho para agradecer a kiva por el apoyo que pueda brindar a través de ceprodel para solucionar el problema  de su vivienda
texts.en:
Sr. Israel Antonio lives in the city of Managua and works as a watchman in a shopping mall. He has two school-aged children.

Israel is the sole breadwinner in the family as his wife looks after the children. For this reason he feels the need to seek a loan to buy zinc sheeting and wood so he can renew the roof on his house which has deteriorated over time. During the winter water leaked into the house and caused problems for his family.

He wants to take this opportunity to thank Kiva for the support they provide to Ceprodel so he can overcome the problem of his house.

loans.use: buy zinc sheeting

loans.name: Josefa Seneyda

texts.es: Josefa es una mujer casada, de profesión maestra de educación primaria, labora en un colegio de la zona donde vive, ella tiene una necesidad de mejorar su vivienda, por eso visito ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento y poder efectuar la obra deseada y de esa manera mejorar las condiciones  familiares, ya que el mismo lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción como ladrillo, cemento, clavos y zinc
texts.en: Josefa’s married and an elementary school teacher by profession.  She works in a local school in the zone where she lives.  She needs to do some home improvements and visited Ceprodel to request a loan to do said improvements to improve her family conditions.   She will use the loan to buy building supplies like bricks, cement, nails and metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Haydee

texts.es: Haydee de 23 años de edad, habita en casa familiar desde hace 10 años.  Ella es una joven muy trabajadora, emprendedora y visionaria. Haydee se dedica a la venta de tortillas (preparación alimenticia de masa de maíz), en el mercado de la comunidad donde habita, siendo este negocio su principal fuente de ingresos.  Desde hace mucho tiempo tiene el deseo de construir una pila que le permita reguardar el agua que extrae del pozo que posee en su casa ya que es muy difícil sacar el agua directamente del pozo cada vez que la necesita.  Por lo anterior,  solicita este préstamo a FUSAI para invertir en la comprar de: arena, ladrillo, y cemento para la construcción de su pila que tanta falta le hace, confía que con esta ayuda podrá cumplir su objetivo y tendrá más tiempo para dedicarse al negocio.
texts.en:
Haydee is 23 years old, and has lived in the family home for ten years. She is described as a hard-working young woman who has an entrepreneurial spirit and a lot of ambition.  Haydee’s principle source of income is selling tortillas in the community market. She says that she prepares her tortillas nutritiously with dough made from corn. For a long time, Haydee has wanted to build a basin to store well water. She says that her home has a well, but that it is very difficult to get water directly from it every time she needs it.

Haydee is requesting this loan from Kiva and the field partner to buy sand, bricks and cement to build a basin for storing water. She says that the basin is badly needed, and she hopes that with the loan she will be able to carry out the construction and have more time to spend on her business.

loans.use: to buy sand, bricks and cement to build a basin for storing water.

loans.name: Francisco Rafael

texts.es: Francisco es un señor ejemplar en su familia y la comunidad por ser una persona amable, cariñoso, ya que su profesión es maestro de educación secundaria el que ejerce con el mismo carisma, es casado con un hijo al que le brinda el apoyo académico necesario para su desarrollo, este señor solicito un financiamiento para las mejora de su vivienda como es la construcción de anexo, dicho crédito lo utilizaría en la compra de hierro, zinc, perlin y mano de obra. El que le vendría a dar mejores condiciones en el ceno familiar.
texts.en: Francisco is an exemplary gentleman in his family and the community, and is known for being a kind and loving person. This follows from his profession; he is a teacher of secondary education, a role he performs with charisma. Francisco is married and has a son, to whom he offers all the necessary educational help with his development. Francisco is requesting fianancing for home improvements, mainly to construct an annex. The loan will be used to purchase iron, zinc, and roof supports, and to pay laborers. He is doing this to create better living conditions in the family's home.

loans.use: to purchase zinc sheets and roof supports, and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Vilma Lorena

texts.es: Vilma  se desempeña como maestra de educación primaria de un colegio de la localidad donde vive con 28 años de laborar en el ,ramo  de la educación, es casada con 3  hijos  a los que le brinda todo el apoyo para su desarrollo, esta señora presenta una necesidad de reparar su vivienda lo que se refiere  a la mejora de pared, ya que dicho crédito lo utilizara en la compra de materiales de construcción como; cemento, ladrillo, hierro y mano de obra, para mejorar los niveles de vida.
texts.en:
Vilma works as an elementary school teacher in a school in her neighborhood.  She has 28 years’ experience in education.  She’s married with three children who she provides with all necessary support for their development.  

She needs to repair her house, specifically to improve the walls.  She will use this loan to buy building supplies like cement, bricks, iron rods and to pay labor costs to improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Wilber Antonio

texts.es: Wilber  es un joven emprendedor, además de ser profesional ostentando la especialidad de ingeniero en sistema, también ejerce un pequeño  negocio  como es  la venta de Ropa y perfumes, actualmente labora en el ministerio de educación de la localidad donde vive, desempeñándose como responsable de estadísticas, este joven es soltero, y actualmente tiene una necesidad de cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, por eso  llego a  ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento para incrementar el inventario de la mercadería que vende y lograr la oportunidad de negocio de la época, y es cuando se mejoran  las ventas, ya que el mismo lo utilizaría en la compra de Camisas y Perfumes , ya que con gran entusiasmo de superar y mejorar las condiciones de vida, realiza este esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Wilber’s a young entrepreneur as well as a distinguished systems engineer.  He also has a small business selling clothes and perfume.  He’s currently employed as a responsible statistician by the Ministry of Education in the location where he lives.  This young man is single.

He needs to meet customer demand which is why he came to Ceprodel to request a loan to increase his stock inventory and take advantage of the business season when sales increase.  He will use it to buy shirts and perfume.  He makes this effort with great enthusiasm in order to improve himself and his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy shirts and perfume.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur lives in the village of Syunik with his parents, sister and brother. For three years already, Artur has been giving piano classes at a local cultural center. With his kind and hard work, Artur teaches local children to play the piano with great love and care. Together with his teacher's work, Artur is also earning money by playing for different private events. Artur is a very talented musician, and, over these years of hard work, he has been able to earn a reputation in the region.

Now, to be able to have his own synthesizer, Artur has applied for this loan. He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. So this loan will help Artur to purchase a synthesizer and continue his talented and important work for the community.

loans.use: to pay for a synthesizer

loans.name: María Petrona

texts.es:
María de 50 años de edad, logro cursar quinto grado de educación básica. Se encuentra casada, su esposo trabaja en diferentes actividades, lo que salga, él esta en Estados Unidos, tuvo que emigrar para ayudar a la familia, pero la situación esta difícil y les  remesa cuando puede. Lo que obliga a María a buscar otras maneras de poder llevar ingresos al hogar. Su hijo trabaja. Ademas de este vive con ella una nieta. 


Ella se dedica a lavar y planchar ajeno, tiene 5 años de hacer este oficio, aprendió esto con su madre; también le ayudaba a su padre en las actividades agrícolas,  ella pudo ver, que esta actividad le generaba ingresos, lo hace en los momentos que no esta cuidando a su nieta. 
Ella tiene que viajar 3 días a la semana, lugar donde realiza su trabajo. La distancia es de 8 km. Y viaja en bus. 

El préstamo lo necesita para instalar una crianza de gallinas, para poder venderlas en la fiestas de fin de año, que es cuando hay gran demanda, por lo cual tiene mejores precios, tendrá ingresos extras por esta actividad.

En el futuro, desea poder crear un  negocio que le permita tener los recursos suficientes, para que a su  familia no le falte nada, que su nieta tenga  estudio, salud., cubra sus  necesidades básicas.
texts.en: Maria, 50, was able to finish the fifth grade of primary school. She is married. Her husband works in different jobs, whatever comes up. He is in the United States. He had to emigrate to help the family, but the situation is difficult and he sends remittances when he can. This means that Maria has look for other ways to bring income into the home. Her son works. Also, a granddaughter lives with her. She works washing and ironing for other people. She has been doing this for five years and she learned it with her mother. She also helped her father with his farm work. She could see that this activity would bring in income. She does it when she is not looking after her granddaughter. She has to travel three days a week, to the place where she works. It's a distance of 8 kilometers, and she travels on the bus. She needs the loan to put in a pen for hens, in order to sell them at the end-of-year parties. This is when there is greater demand, so she has better prices. She will have extra income from this activity. In the future, she wants to be able to create a business what will allow to have sufficient resources so that her family wants for nothing, and so that her granddaughter has an education, her health, and her basic expenses covered.

loans.use: to install a place to raise hens.

loans.name: Tadeo

texts.en: Tadeo is 34 years old and is married with five children. He earns his income through the sale of agricultural produce and by monthly compensation as a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). Community Knowledge Workers are trusted community members who provide agricultural data and advice to rural farmers in their local area including information about the weather, market prices, crop diseases and agricultural tools. On his land, Tadeo grows maize, beans and coffee. He also rears goats, pigs and chickens. Tadeo has served as a CKW for the last two years, and he looks forward to renewing his CKW contract for the next three years. As a CKW, he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set and weighing scale) to share agricultural information with fellow farmers in his village, helping them to double their crop yields. With the additional money that he will earn as a CKW, Tadeo will set up an agriculture produce store in his community, and he looks forward to becoming a self-reliant farmer in his community.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, solar charging set and weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a solar panel for her house.

loans.name: Antonia Del Carmen

texts.es:
